task_14.description: Place the blue cup next to the green tissue, ensuring the tissue is not folded
task_14.initial_setup: The blue cup is upright on the center of the table. The green tissue is folded and lying flat on the far left corner. A red paper cup is upright on the right side, 25 cm from the edge.
task_14.final_state: The blue cup is placed 10 cm to the right of the green tissue, which is now flat and centered on the table. The red cup remains untouched.
